title: How to Create a Featured Image Template for a Jekyll Blog Site
featured-image-alt: a camera on a stand pointing toward a mountain
teaser: This brief tutorial reviews how to create a blog post featured image template file for the Jekyll static site generator platform.

title: Announcing the Python for ArcGIS Course
featured-image-alt: Harrisburg Area Community College Lancaster campus
teaser: The Python for ArcGIS course is now available through Harrisburg Area Community College.  I share the course outline, a sample video lesson, and a sample script.

title: Are You Thinking About Your Map Users?
featured-image-alt: people walking across a street intersection
teaser: It is important for us to consider how people are using the printed maps and web map applications we develop.  I share some thoughts on this topic, as well as examples of how I do this.
